New Records: CJ McCollum tied a career-high with 50 points
Key Match Events: McCollum scored eight points as New Orleans began the third quarter with a 17-4 run that gave it a 79-72 lead
Jordan Hawkins made a 3-pointer to tie the score at 101 and start a 10-0 run that gave New Orleans a 108-101 lead
The Pelicans scored the first six points of the game and McCollum had eight in the first 3:33 of the game as New Orleans took a 13-4 lead
Champagnie scored five points during a 12-2 run that pushed the Wizards into a 16-15 lead
Brogdon and Jonas Valanciunas scored four each to help Washington take a 37-29 lead into the second quarter
McCollum made two 3-pointers and Boston and Jose Alvarado made one each to help New Orleans take a 43-42 lead
